sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function ThrillerEditRow({ thrillerState, editRowKey, removeMovie }) { const activateRemoveMovieFromEdit = (movieId) => { removeMovie(movieId) } return ( <> {thrillerState.map((m, i) => (m.id === editRowKey) ? {i + 1} : {i + 1} {m.name} {m.year} {m.rating} ) } ) }
